siteMetadata.title: Ghost Docs
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about working with the Ghost professional publishing platform.

frontmatter.title: run
frontmatter.meta_description: Start a Ghost instance in the foreground for debugging using this single command with the Ghost-CLI. Read more in the official documentation!

markdownRemark.html:
This utility command starts your Ghost site in foreground.

Use ghost run. It is only useful for debugging purposes. Nothing more to see here ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
